problem_statement: Write a function that calculates the sum of two numbers.

problem_statement: Write a function that calculates the area of a circle given its radius.
Write a function that calculates the sine of an angle (in degrees).

Write a function that calculates the mean of a list of numbers.

input_parameters.name: coefficients
input_parameters.description: List of coefficients starting from the highest degree term.

problem_statement: Write a function that implements a queue using two stacks.

input_parameters.name: operations
input_parameters.description: List of operations to be performed. The operations can be 'enqueue <x>' to add an element to the queue, and 'dequeue' to remove and get the front element from the queue.

output_parameters.name: results
output_parameters.description: List of results of the dequeue operations. If a dequeue operation is called on an empty queue, append -1 to the results list.
